text: allahu israyil santatikaleat karar vannukayum, avaril ninn pantrant netakkanmare niyeagikkukayumuntayi. allahu (avareat‌) parannu: tirccayayum nan ninnalute kuteyunt‌. ninnal prart'thana murapeale nirvahikkukayum, sakatt nalkukayum, enre dutanmaril visvasikkukayum, avare sahayikkukayum, allahuvinn uttamamaya katam keatukkukayum ceytu keantirikkunna paksam tirccayayum ninnalute tinmakal ninnalil ninn nan mayccukalayukayum, talbhagatt kuti aruvikal olukunna svargatteappukalil ninnale nan pravesippikkukayum ceyyunnatan‌. ennal atinu sesam ninnalil ninn ar avisvasiccuvea avan nermargattil ninn terrippeayirikkunnu
